mapper.insert: insert into t_user (name, display_name, delete_flag, creator, create_time, updater, update_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, display_name, delete_flag, creator, create_time, updater, update_time from t_user
